channel.title: A much better place to put your area/wild checks

item.title: A much better place to put your area/wild checks
item.dc:creator: @silabsoft RuneAgent
item.description:
@silabsoft wrote:

Instead of wasting cpu putting your wildcheck in the process why not put it where it would be best utilized, for example open up your player.java and you will find this

		dir >>= 1;
		currentX += misc.directionDeltaX[dir];
		currentY += misc.directionDeltaY[dir];
		absX += misc.directionDeltaX[dir];
		absY += misc.directionDeltaY[dir];
		return dir;

Put your wild checks, or any area checks

Read full topic
item.source: A much better place to put your area/wild checks
